short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get inspired anytime, anywhere with our Demotivational Quote Generator. The perfect tool for a quick boost of demotivation!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Demotivational Quote Generator is a chrome extension that generates discouraging and demotivating quotes to deflate and demoralize people from pursuing their goals. The application randomly selects from a list of demotivational quotes and displays them on the screen. Users can refresh the page to get a new quote or share the quote with their friends on social media to spread their sense of hopelessness. The chrome extension is perfect for anyone who wants a quick way to feel miserable and defeated throughout their day. Whether you're a student, a professional, an entrepreneur, or just someone who wants to embrace their own insignificance, the Demotivational Quote Generator is the perfect tool for you!
